channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Building on COVID-19's Innovation Momentum for Digital, Inclusive Education
item.description: Building on COVID-19's Innovation Momentum for Digital, Inclusive Education by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Thursday 12 May 2022 at 9:00.

item.description: Enhancing the Oversight Impact of Chile’s Supreme Audit Institution - Applying Behavioural Insights for Public Integrity by Directorate for Public Governance has an embargo on Monday 16 May 2022 at 8:00.

item.description: OECD Skills Strategy Implementation Guidance for Flanders, Belgium - The Faces of Learners in Flanders by Centre for Skills has an embargo on Monday 16 May 2022 at 8:00.

item.title: Financing transportation infrastructure through Land Value Capture - Concepts, tools, and case studies
